words.defineVi: (của máy nghe nhạc, nhạc cụ, v.v.) để tạo ra hình ảnh hoặc âm thanh được ghi lại

examples: They play the guitar together during jam sessions.
She usually plays the guitar by ear, rather than reading the music.
He kept his guitar in his room and played music whenever he felt like it.
Unless you’ve got money to burn, these expensive guitars are probably not for you.
He loves playing the guitar.
words.defineEn: a musical instrument, usually with six strings, played by pulling the strings with the fingers or with a plectrum
words.defineVi: một nhạc cụ, thường có sáu dây, được chơi bằng cách kéo dây bằng ngón tay hoặc bằng miếng gảy

examples: listen to our problems.
Listen Jane.
I listened carefully to her story.
Don’t listen to Jerry.
Don't listen to him.
words.defineEn: to give our attention to the sound a person or thing is making
words.defineVi: để cung cấp cho sự chú ý của chúng tôi đến âm thanh một người hoặc điều đang làm

examples: Can you read music?
The music was far too loud for my liking.
Her words were music to my ears.
Set this poem to music.
That music really gets me.
words.defineEn: a series of sounds made by instruments or voices, arranged in a way that is pleasant or exciting to listen to
words.defineVi: một loạt âm thanh được tạo ra bởi các nhạc cụ hoặc giọng nói, được sắp xếp theo cách dễ chịu hoặc thú vị để nghe

examples: That hot guy had a good head on his shoulders.
The hotel had expensive rates during the holiday season.
The group has a new CD in the pipeline.
The police had the situation well in hand.
The theatre company has several new productions in the pipeline for next season.
words.defineEn: to eat or drink something
words.defineVi: để ăn hoặc uống một cái gì đó

examples: She made coffee for us all.
The coffee in the mug was a dark.
The coffee table was a dark wood color.
Surprisingly, the little café had the best coffee in town.
The little café had, surprisingly, the best coffee in town.
words.defineEn: a drink that is made from mixing water with some crushed seeds, called coffee beans, usually hot and brown in color
words.defineVi: một thức uống được làm từ nước trộn với một số hạt nghiền nhỏ, được gọi là hạt cà phê, thường nóng và có màu nâu
